explains: v. 消耗，消费；吃，喝；吞噬，烧毁；使……着迷，充满
wordGroup: propensity to consume 消费倾向
marginal propensity to consume [经]边际消费倾向

sentences.en: Many people are unaware of just how much food and drink they consume.
sentences.cn: 许多人不知道自己到底消耗掉多少食物和饮料。

sentences.en: Some of the most efficient refrigerators consume 70 percent less electricity than traditional models.
sentences.cn: 一些能效最高的冰箱比传统型号少消耗70%的电。

sentences.en: I can consume at any point along the line.
sentences.cn: 我可以在这条线上任意一点进行消费。
